content:
Introduction GitLab Runner is an application that works with GitLab CI/CD to run jobs in a pipeline. GitLab Runner is open-source and written in Go. It can be run as a single binary; no language-specific requirements are needed.
How to update? Stop the service 1  sudo gitlab-runner stop   Download the binary to replace the GitLab Runner executable We can see the list of all releases in the Official Gitlab Runner repository.
In this case I had an Ubuntu machine and wanted to update to the latest v14.x machine. so the proer version is v14.8.3.
1  sudo curl -L --output /usr/local/bin/gitlab-runner "https://gitlab-runner-downloads.s3.amazonaws.com/v14.8.3/binaries/gitlab-runner-linux-amd64"   Setting permissions to execute 1  sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/gitlab-runner   Starting the service 1  sudo gitlab-runner start   Done ðŸ™‚
title: How to update Gitlab Runners?
